title: TikTok Deal Has Won China’s Blessing, Trump Says After Xi Call
description: President Donald Trump said that his Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping had given approval to a sale of TikTok’s US operations to American investors, though he acknowledged that some final steps still need to be worked out.

title: TikTok Deal Nearer Finish Line After Trump, Xi Call | Bloomberg Tech 9/19/2025
description: Bloomberg’s Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow discuss headlines coming out of a call between US President Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping about a framework agreement for TikTok's US operations. Plus, Apple rolls out its new iPhone 17 models in stores with long lines and reports of scratches. And FCC Commissioner Anna Gomez talks about the suspension of the Jimmy Kimmel show and threats from the Trump administration to pull some broadcast licenses. (Source: Bloomberg)

title: Oracle in Talks With Meta on $20 Billion AI Cloud Deal
description: Oracle Corp. is in discussions with Meta Platforms Inc. for a cloud computing deal worth about $20 billion, providing further evidence that the company has become a significant infrastructure provider.
